sentences.sContent: Milk fabric has been around since the 1930s but was always produced in unecological ways that used a lot of chemicals.
sentences.sContent_eng: Milk fabric has been around since the 1930s but was always produced in unecological ways that used a lot of chemicals.
sentences.sCn: 牛奶纤维最早出现于上世纪30年代，但一直通过非生态方式生产，使用了大量化学成分。
